itsaStatusDetails.descripton: An array of ITSA status details for a specific National Insurance number and tax year.

submittedOn.description: The date the ITSA status was submitted, in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ

status.description: The ITSA status for the tax year.

statusReason.description: The reason for the ITSA status.

businessIncome2YearsPrior.description:
The business income for 2 years prior to the specified taxYear.

For example, if the tax year requested is 2026-27, then 'businessIncome2YearsPrior' is for the 2024-25 tax year.

For Q4 check, the business income 1 year prior will be used.
